db:abstract.db:para: The QVideoEncoderSettingsControl class provides access to the settings of a media service that performs video encoding.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: If a QMediaService supports encoding video data it will implement QVideoEncoderSettingsControl. This control provides information about the limits of restricted video encoder options and allows the selection of a set of video encoder settings as specified in a QVideoEncoderSettings object.
The functionality provided by this control is exposed to application code through the QMediaRecorder class.
The interface name of QVideoEncoderSettingsControl is org.qt-project.qt.videoencodersettingscontrol/5.0 as defined in QVideoEncoderSettingsControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::QVideoEncoderSettingsControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Create a new video encoder settings control object with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::~QVideoEncoderSettingsControl()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a video encoder settings control.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::setVideoSettings(const QVideoEncoderSettings &settings)
db:section.db:para: Sets the selected video encoder settings.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<qreal> QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::supportedFrameRates(const QVideoEncoderSettings &settings = QVideoEncoderSettings(), bool *continuous = 0) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of supported frame rates.
If non null video settings parameter is passed, the returned list is reduced to frame rates supported with partial settings like video codec or video resolution applied.
If the encoder supports arbitrary frame rates within the supported range, *continuous is set to true, otherwise *continuous is set to false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QSize> QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::supportedResolutions(const QVideoEncoderSettings &settings = QVideoEncoderSettings(), bool *continuous = 0) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of supported resolutions.
If non null video settings parameter is passed, the returned list is reduced to resolution supported with partial settings like video codec or frame rate applied.
If the encoder supports arbitrary resolutions within the supported resolutions range, *continuous is set to true, otherwise *continuous is set to false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QStringList QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::supportedVideoCodecs() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of supported video codecs.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::videoCodecDescription(const QString &codec) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a description of a video codec.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QVideoEncoderSettings QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::videoSettings() const
db:section.db:para: The returned value may be different tha passed to QVideoEncoderSettingsControl::setVideoSettings() if the settings contains the default or undefined parameters. In this case if the undefined parameters are already resolved, they should be returned.

db:section.db:title: QVideoEncoderSettingsControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QVideoEncoderSettingsControl class.
